meta.title: Programs - The School of Freedom
meta.description: Explore our comprehensive programs including virtual learning for Afghan girls, leadership development, ESL tutoring, and creative expression initiatives.

hero.title: Our Programs
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive educational initiatives designed to empower, inspire, and transform lives through learning.

programs.title: Virtual Learning for Afghan Girls
programs.description: Comprehensive online education programs designed specifically for Afghan girls, providing access to quality education despite geographical and social barriers.

programs.title: Leadership & Mentorship
programs.description: Developing the next generation of leaders through one-on-one mentorship, leadership workshops, and personal development programs.

programs.title: ESL Tutoring & College Prep
programs.description: Supporting Afghan refugee youth in the U.S. with English language learning, academic tutoring, and college preparation services.

programs.title: Student Artwork & Creative Expression
programs.description: Encouraging creativity and self-expression through art programs that help students process their experiences and share their stories.

artSection.title: Student Artwork & Expression
artSection.subtitle: Our students express their hopes, dreams, and experiences through powerful artwork that tells their stories.

rows.quote: It wasn't always easy, but it's worth it.
rows.body: This powerful piece represents the resilience and determination of our students. Through art, they share their journey of overcoming challenges and finding strength in education and community.

rows.title: The Power of Creative Expression
paragraphs: Art serves as a universal language that transcends barriers and allows our students to communicate their experiences, hopes, and dreams. Through creative expression, they process their journey and inspire others.
Each piece tells a story of courage, resilience, and the transformative power of education. These artworks remind us why our mission is so important and the impact we're making in young lives.

galleryLink.title: Explore More Student Art
galleryLink.subtitle: Visit our full gallery to see additional drawings, paintings, and creative projects.

impact.title: Making a Real Difference
impact.subtitle: Our programs are more than just educational initiatives—they're lifelines that provide hope, opportunity, and a pathway to a brighter future for Afghan girls and refugee youth.

items.title: Quality Education
items.text: Providing world-class education regardless of location or circumstances.

items.title: Emotional Support
items.text: Creating safe spaces for healing, growth, and personal development.

items.title: Community Building
items.text: Fostering connections and building supportive networks for lasting impact.
